sentences.cn: 无论蓓蕾,无论硕果累累.

sentences.en: He brandished a sheaf of documents.
sentences.cn: 他手里挥舞着一扎文件.

sentences.en: He draw a sheaf of papers from his breast pocket.
sentences.cn: 他从上衣口袋里抽出一札文件.

sentences.en: He drew a sheaf of papers from his breast pocket.
sentences.cn: 他从上衣口袋里抽出一扎文件.

sentences.en: He picked up a sheaf of papers.
He searched for and found a sheaf of papers in cabinet.
sentences.cn: 他在柜中寻找到一扎文件.

sentences.en: He thrust his hand between a sheaf of loosened papers and crackled them.
sentences.cn: 他把手插进一捆松散的纸张中,一把抓住而使发出窸窣之声.

sentences.en: He took out a sheaf of papers and leafed through them.
sentences.cn: 他拿出一沓报纸，匆匆翻阅了一下。

sentences.en: In profile allshowedthe end of the nose projecting from beyond a sheaf of shiny black hair.
sentences.cn: 从侧面望去,披散开的头发中只能看到突出的鼻尖.

sentences.en: Instead every successful grain produces a stalk and a sheaf containing many more grains.
sentences.cn: 但实际上从一株小麦上可收成许许多多的麦子.

sentences.en: She brings the ends of the bond together, and kneels on the sheaf while she ties it, beating back her skirts now and then when lifted by the breeze.
sentences.cn: 她把捆扎麦子的那束麦子的两头收拢来，跪在麦捆上把它捆紧，微风把她的裙子吹了起来，她也不断地把它扯回去。

sentences.en: She moved the sheaf of papers into position.
sentences.cn: 她把那捆报纸挪到合适的地方。

sentences.en: There is a sheaf of starlight belongs to me.
sentences.cn: 深蓝色的夜空,有一束属于我的星光.

trans.tran_en: a bunch of wheat, corn etc tied together after it has been cut
